  - name: PlayerViewService:GetDeviceCameraCFrame
    summary: |
      Returns a world space Datatype.CFrame looking at the player's character.
    description: |
      Returns a world space Datatype.CFrame looking at the player's character,
      such that setting the current camera's Datatype.CFrame will view that
      character from the perspective of their device.

      This method leverages the device's camera and it only functions on mobile
      devices. If no information is available, for example the user is not on a
      mobile device or they don't have their camera turned on, this method
      returns a Datatype.CFrame.identity.

      See Roblox Connect for a sample
      implementation of this method.

    returns:
